src:
Hasil Balap MotoGP Malaysia: Maverick Vinales Rebut Kemenangan
03 Nov 2019, 14:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Maverick Vinales, sukses meraih kemenangan dalam MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Minggu (3/11/2019). Ini adalah kemenangan perdana Yamaha di Sepang sejak 2010 lewat Valentino Rossi.
Pebalap Spanyol ini diikuti oleh pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez, di posisi kedua dan pebalap Ducati Team, Andrea Dovizioso, di posisi ketiga.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha lainnya, Valentino Rossi, dan pebalap Suzuki Ecstar, Alex Rins.
Berikut hasil balap MotoGP Malaysia 2019 (20 lap).
text:
Malaysian MotoGP Race Results: Maverick Vinales Wins Victory
Nov 3 2019, 14:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yamaha Energy Monster racer, Maverick Vinales, successfully won a victory in the Malaysian MotoGP at the Sepang Circuit on Sunday (3/11/2019). This is Yamaha's inaugural victory at Sepang since 2010 through Valentino Rossi.
The Spanish rider was followed by Repsol Honda rider Marc Marquez in second place and Ducati Team rider Andrea Dovizioso in third position.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by another Yamaha Energy Monster racer, Valentino Rossi, and Suzuki Ecstar rider Alex Rins.
Here are the results of the 2019 Malaysian MotoGP race (20 laps).
